snippet: The sculptor creates larger than life representations of women.
abstract: The sculptor creates larger than life representations of women.
lead_paragraph: "Women are the focus of my work," said sculptor Ravinder Reddy, who has spent almost two decades creating monumental sculptures of women. Some of these celebrate curvaceous female bodies, others are just giant heads portraying women; his style typically defines them by neatly coiled or braided black hair, wide dark eyes, colored lips, the nose and ears pierced with ornaments.
